channel.title: Comments on: Remembering To Document Everything

item.title: By: Jim Vanderveen
item.dc:creator: Jim Vanderveen
item.description: Actually, I would call that a poorly-named function. Instead of <code>comment-check()</code>, perhaps a more meaningful (and self-documenting) name would have been <code>comment-is-spam()</code>.
item.content:encoded: Actually, I would call that a poorly-named function. Instead of comment-check(), perhaps a more meaningful (and self-documenting) name would have been comment-is-spam().
